name: GiveItem
description: Give an item from your hand to another character.
usage: Use this action when you want to give an item you're holding to another character.

parameters.name: target_character
parameters.description: The name of the character to give the item to

examples: Giving a gift to a friend
Handing over a tool to someone
requirements: Target character must be nearby and interactable
Actor must have an item in hand
Target character must have space in their inventory
whenToUse: Want to give a gift to someone
Want to help someone with a tool
